title: Android 11 / Pixel 3 / Fi - flutters between WiFi and LTE
content:
Android 11 / Pixel 3 / Project Fi
Was working fine with Android 10 2 days ago
Previously known home network, 5 & 2.5 ghz, WPA2
WiFi connects but then flutters between home WiFi and Fi LTE every 3-5 seconds
Have rebooted, forgot and re-added home WiFi

Thanks
